gameDetails.name: A Feast for Odin: New Special Tiles
gameDetails.description:
New Special Tiles. Mini expansion, contained in "Deutscher Spielepreis 2017 Goodie Box".

The Deutscher Spielepreis 2017 Goodie Box is a product to support the Deutscher Spielepreis, the second biggest German board game prize, for which thousands of players vote each year between May and July for their favorite game.
